title: The Universe page makes my screen go black.
body:
Title.

Note, it doesn't crash my computer. I use a laptop, and so when I close my laptop, and I have it go into sleep mode for a second, that fixes it when I open it back up, and log back in. Thing is, the Universe site does it constantly, so I can't even get through a single story without having to do this multiple times.

Any suggestions on what it might be? Do note that only the Universe site does this.

replies.body:
Since our Universe page runs some scripts and can sometimes have pop-ups, let's make sure you have any adblockers or other addons that block scripts or pop-ups turned off first. It could be that your addons are trying to block the page altogether. If that doesn't work, try checking the Universe page on another browser.

Hit me up if you're still having issues with the Universe page!
That seems to have done it. I was able to actually get through a full story this time. Thank you!
